name: 10 Seconds to Draw
description:
You are a young aspiring astronaut in preparation to go tothe moon, but before that  you must train your quick thinking skills which will be crucial for your future endeavours on space.

 This is a sumbition for the Mini Jam 130: Lunar

While playing press 1 to use the black brush 2 for the red brush 3 For the green one 4 For the Blue one 5 For the Yellow One
